name: burn-image-recognition
description: A deep learning template for recognizing handwritten numbers in images using the Burn framework
author: Ferrisup Team
next_steps: 📥 Download the MNIST dataset: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- download
🧠 Train the image recognition model: cargo run -- train
🔍 Test with sample images: cargo run -- test
🖼️ Try with your own images: cargo run -- predict path/to/your/image.png
📚 Read the getting started guide: cat GETTING_STARTED.md
